A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the worst of the Star Wars saga. I wondered what it would take to make me actually want to watch The Phantom Menace\, well TLJ did the trick. The Force Awakens wasn't great\, but it did leave fans with open storylines that we wanted addressed. Well everything good in the Star Wars saga was undone by TLJ. I kept waiting for the orphans to break out in \"It's the hard-knock life\". If you haven't seen TLJ\, go watch the trailers and call it a day\, they are infinitely better than the movie.
